introDataApi.title: About Us
introDataApi.desc: Founded in 2013, NTS Engineering Co., Ltd. aims to become the leading provider of engineering solutions. The main areas NTS has passionately pursued from the beginning are: Mechanical and electrical consulting, Water treatment, Water reuse; Providing garden equipment, irrigation equipment; Rainwater harvesting equipment and other utilities...
